attributes.action: Change the Voting System from First Past The Post to PROPORTIONAL REPRESENTATION
attributes.additional_details: In the last few years we have moved away from the two party system with a greater choice emerging, the population has become more politically aware and diverse and want their views and aspirations represented more openly in Parliament.
attributes.background:
In recent Elections, tactical voting took place along with parties NOT fielding candidates, it is time we had a voting system where every vote counts!
In 2011 the referendum rejected an AV System, this referendum must be PR versus FPTP.
